articles.author: ESPN News Services
articles.title: Sam Kerr found not guilty of racially abusing cop - ESPN
articles.description: Chelsea and Australia striker Sam Kerr has been found not guilty of the racially aggravated harassment of a police officer in London.
articles.content:
Feb 11, 2025, 09:09 AM ET
Chelsea and Australia striker Sam Kerr has been found not guilty of the racially aggravated harassment of a police officer in London.
Kerr, 31, was on trial for the allege… [+4169 chars]
